attributes.action: Create a bank holiday to commemorate all armed forces of uk for their sacrifice past and present
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to create a day when we as a nation stop and think about and realise the efforts and sacrifices our armed forces of the united kingdom have made past and present, i feel that as time moves on we are not remembering or care for what has happened or is happening and a marked day will at least put it in our minds at the very least the reason why we are having a day off.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
